name: DeployOCC
description: Deploy an Orckestra Commerce Cloud environment using Orckestra's Cloud Management Platform.
author: Orckestra Technologies Inc.

inputs.name: manifestLocation
inputs.label: Deployment manifest location

inputs.name: cmpClientCode
inputs.label: Client Code
inputs.helpMarkDown: The code of the client in CMP. See also [documentation](https://docs.orckestra.com/developer-documentation/getting-started/setting-up-your-platform/undersanding-the-project-template/azure-devops-pipeline-tasks#deployocc-clientcode).

inputs.name: environment
inputs.label: Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: The CMP code of the environment on which to deploy (int, qa, etc.). See alsoÂ [documentation](https://docs.orckestra.com/developer-documentation/getting-started/setting-up-your-platform/undersanding-the-project-template/azure-devops-pipeline-tasks#deployocc-environment).

inputs.name: bannerCode
inputs.label: Banner Code
inputs.helpMarkDown:
[Optional] 
The banner code of the site to deploy. 
This only applies to purpose-made 'banner' environments on Azure. 
Banners are supported by OCC version 5.4.0 and above.

inputs.name: bannerRegionCode
inputs.label: Banner Region Code
inputs.helpMarkDown:
[Optional] 
The banner region code of the site to deploy. 
This only applies to purpose-made 'banner' environments on Azure. 
Banners are supported by OCC version 5.4.0 and above.

inputs.name: cmpUrl
inputs.label: CMP URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL to CMP. Invariably, https://api.orckestra.cloud

inputs.name: cmpUsername
inputs.label: CMP username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username used to access CMP. See also [documentation](https://docs.orckestra.com/developer-documentation/getting-started/setting-up-your-platform/undersanding-the-project-template/azure-devops-pipeline-tasks#cmp-connection).

inputs.name: cmpPassword
inputs.label: CMP password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password associated with the CMP username.

inputs.name: desiredInstallerFile
inputs.label: Path to desired installer file
inputs.helpMarkDown: File (build artifact) that lists the packages to be deployed. See [documentation](https://docs.orckestra.com/developer-documentation/getting-started/setting-up-your-platform/undersanding-the-project-template/azure-devops-pipeline-tasks#deployocc-path-to-desired-installer-file).

inputs.name: deploymentType
inputs.label: Deployment type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether the deployment should be prepared, executed, or both. See also [documentation](https://docs.orckestra.com/developer-documentation/getting-started/setting-up-your-platform/undersanding-the-project-template/azure-devops-pipeline-tasks#deployocc-deploymenttype).

inputs.name: deploymentFolder
inputs.label: Deployment folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder containing the prepared installation file.

inputs.name: cmpComponents
inputs.label: Components to deploy
inputs.helpMarkDown: The OCC platform component(s) to deploy.

inputs.name: desiredState
inputs.label: Desired State
inputs.helpMarkDown: The list of packages to be deployed. See [documentation](https://docs.orckestra.com/developer-documentation/getting-started/setting-up-your-platform/undersanding-the-project-template/azure-devops-pipeline-tasks#deployocc-desired-state).
